00092 template<int V>
00093 void MotionMatrix<V>::svd_solve(const MeasurementMatrix<V> &measurement) {
00094 
00095   ShapeMatrix           shape;
00096   SturmTriggsSolver<V>  stSolver(*this, shape);
00097 
00098   stSolver.solve(measurement);
00099 
00100   /******
00101   MeasurementMatrix<V>  scaledMeasurement(measurement);
00102   ImageTransform<V>     denormalisation;
00103   ShapeMatrix           shape;
00104 
00105   scaledMeasurement.normalise(denormalisation);
00106   scaledMeasurement.approx_scale();
00107   scaledMeasurement.factorise_with_occlusions(*this, shape);
00108   scaledMeasurement.scale_and_fill(*this, shape);
00109 
00110   std::cout << "Filled measurement = " << std::endl;
00111   std::cout << scaledMeasurement << std::endl;
00112 
00113   scaledMeasurement.svd_factorise(*this, shape);
00114   denormalisation.apply_to(*this);
00115   *****/
00116 }

00123 template<int V>
00124 double MotionMatrix<V>::bundle_adjust(int f, const MeasurementMatrix<V> &measurement) {
00125   int                   info;
00126   Eigen::VectorXd       err;
00127   MeasurementMatrix<V>  scaledMeasurement(measurement);
00128   ImageTransform<V>     denormalisation;
00129   BundleAdjuster<V>     ba_solver(scaledMeasurement, *this);
00130 
00131   // scaledMeasurement.normalise(denormalisation, true);
00132   // denormalisation.apply_inverse_to(*this);
00133   ba_solver.levmar_solve(f);
00134   // denormalisation.apply_to(*this);
00135 
00136   reprojection_err(measurement, err);
00137   return(err.norm());
00138 }

00164 template<int V>
00165 template<int F>
00166 Eigen::Matrix4d MotionMatrix<V>::diac_euclidean_lift(int nCameras, const ImageTransform<F> &fixedIntrinsics) {
00167   int                   i,j,k;
00168   Eigen::Matrix4d       H;
00169   Eigen::Matrix3d       diac;
00170 
00171   // H = [A|B]
00172 
00173   // --- first compute B, assuming origin
00174   // --- is at the first view so if P_0 = [R|r]
00175   // --- and B = [b|1] then Rb = -r
00176   // ------------------------------
00177   Eigen::Matrix3d       R;
00178   Eigen::Vector3d       r;
00179  
00180   R = view(0).leftCols(3);
00181   r = view(0).col(3);
00182   H.col(3).topRows(3) = -R.inverse()*r;
00183   H(3,3) = 1.0;
00184 
00185   // --- now do linear least squares on constraints:
00186   // ---        [ a_i  0   0   ]
00187   // --- w_i =  [ 0   a_i  0   ] = PQP^T
00188   // ---        [ 0    0   s_i ]
00189   // --- and s_1 = 1.0;
00190   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 10> coeffs; // coefficients of Q
00191   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>  y;  // vals of fit coeffs*x=y
00192   Eigen::Matrix<double, 10, 1>          x;      // result of least square fit
00193   Eigen::Matrix4d                       Q;      // result repacked as matrix
00194 
00195   // --- construct matrix of coefficients of elements of Q
00196   if(nCameras < F) nCameras = F;
00197   coeffs.resize(4*F + 3*(nCameras-F) + V + 1,10);
00198   y.resize(4*F + 3*(nCameras-F) + V + 1);
00199   y.fill(0.0);
00200   i = 0;
00201   for(j = 0; j < V; ++j) {
00202     if(j<F) {
00203       // --- constrains for known intrinsics:
00204       // --- i   -> w_00 - (fx^2 + px^2)w_22 = 0
00205       // --- i+1 -> w_01 - (pxpy)w_22 = 0
00206       // --- i+2 -> w_02 - (px)w_22 = 0
00207       // --- i+3 -> w_11 - (fy^2 + py^2)w_22 = 0
00208       // --- i+4 -> w_12 - (py)w_22 = 0
00209       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(2), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+5));
00210       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(0), coeffs.row(i));
00211       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+1));
00212       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+2));
00213       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+3));
00214       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+4));
00215       diac = fixedIntrinsics.view(j) * fixedIntrinsics.view(j).transpose();
00216       diac /= diac(2,2);
00217       coeffs.row(i)   -= diac(0,0) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00218       coeffs.row(i+1) -= diac(0,1) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00219       coeffs.row(i+2) -= diac(0,2) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00220       coeffs.row(i+3) -= diac(1,1) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00221       coeffs.row(i+4) -= diac(1,2) * coeffs.row(i+5);
00222       i += 5;
00223     } else {
00224       // --- constrain for aspect skew + pxpy = 0 
00225       quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i));
00226       ++i;
00227       if(j<nCameras) {
00228         // --- constraints for cameras:
00229         // --- i    -> x-principal point = 0
00230         // --- i+1  -> y-principal point = 0
00231         // --- i+2  -> aspect ratio = 1
00232         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00233         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+1));
00234         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(0), coeffs.row(i+2));
00235         quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+3)); // tmp
00236         coeffs.row(i+2) -= coeffs.row(i+3);
00237         i += 3;
00238       }
00239     }
00240   }
00241   // --- constraint on scale
00242   quadratic_prod(view(0).row(2), view(0).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00243   y(i) = 1.0;
00244 
00245   // --- solve least squares and reform Q
00246 
00247   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00248 
00249   std::cout << "Euclidean lift rms error on 1st pass = " << std::endl;
00250   std::cout << (coeffs*x - y).norm() << std::endl;
00251 
00252   k = 0;
00253   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00254     for(j = i; j<4; ++j){ 
00255       Q(i,j) = Q(j,i) = x(k++);
00256     }
00257     Q(i,i) *= 2.0;
00258   }
00259 
00260   // --- re-weight the coefficients and solve again
00261   double weight;
00262   i = 0;
00263   for(j=0; j<V; ++j) {
00264     weight = 1.0/(view(j) * Q * view(j).transpose())(2,2);
00265     if(j<F) {
00266       coeffs.middleRows<5>(i) *= weight;
00267       i += 5;
00268     }
00269     else {
00270       coeffs.row(i) *= weight;
00271       ++i;
00272       if(j<nCameras) {
00273         coeffs.middleRows<3>(i) *= weight;
00274         i += 3;
00275       }
00276     }
00277   }
00278 
00279   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00280 
00281   std::cout << "Euclidean lift rms error on 2nd pass = " << std::endl;
00282   std::cout << (coeffs*x - y).norm() << std::endl;
00283 
00284   k = 0;
00285   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00286     for(j = i; j<4; ++j){ 
00287       Q(i,j) = Q(j,i) = x(k++);
00288     }
00289     Q(i,i) *= 2.0;
00290   }
00291 
00292   // --- extract A from Q
00293   // --------------------
00294   Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::Matrix4d> svdQ(Q, Eigen::ComputeFullU);
00295   H.leftCols(3) = svdQ.matrixU().leftCols(3) * 
00296     svdQ.singularValues().topRows(3).cwiseSqrt().asDiagonal();
00297 
00298   // --- set reference rotation
00299   // --- so that P_0 has zero
00300   // --- rotation: MM^T = [M|t]Q[M|t]^T = KK^T
00301   // --- PH = K[R|0] so K^-1PH = [R|0]
00302   // --- so PH[R^-1|0] = K[I|0]
00303   // ---      [ 0  |1]
00304   // -----------------------------------------
00305   Eigen::Matrix3d       K1;   // inverse intrinsics of view 0
00306   Eigen::Matrix4d       Rot; // rotation
00307   Eigen::Matrix3d       MMT; // MM^T where P=[M|t]
00308 
00309   MMT = view(0)*Q*view(0).transpose();
00310   K1 = MMT.inverse().llt().matrixU();
00311 
00312   Rot.fill(0.0);
00313   Rot.topLeftCorner(3,3) = (K1*(view(0)*H).leftCols(3)).inverse();
00314   Rot(3,3) = 1.0;
00315 
00316   H *= Rot;
00317   
00318   return(H);
00319 }
00320 
00321 template<int V>
00322 Eigen::Matrix4d MotionMatrix<V>::diac_euclidean_lift(int nCameras) {
00323   ImageTransform<0> dummy;
00324   return(diac_euclidean_lift(nCameras, dummy));
00325 }

00331 template<int V>
00332 Eigen::Vector3d MotionMatrix<V>::plane_at_infinity(int nCameras) {
00333   int                           i,j,k;
00334   Eigen::Matrix<double,4,3>     A;
00335   Eigen::Vector3d               p; // Plane at infinity
00336 
00337   // --- now do linear least squares on constraints:
00338   // ---        [ a_i  0   0   ]
00339   // --- w_i =  [ 0   a_i  0   ] = PQP^T
00340   // ---        [ 0    0   s_i ]
00341   // --- and s_1 = 1.0;
00342   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 10> coeffs; // coefficients of Q
00343   Eigen::Matrix<double, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>  y;  // vals of fit coeffs*x=y
00344   Eigen::Matrix<double, 10, 1>          x;      // result of least square fit
00345   Eigen::Matrix4d                       Q;      // result repacked as matrix
00346 
00347   // --- construct matrix of coefficients of elements of Q
00348   coeffs.resize(3*nCameras + V + 1,10);
00349   y.resize(3*nCameras + V + 1);
00350   y.fill(0.0);
00351   i = 0;
00352   j = 0;
00353   for(j = 0; j< nCameras; ++j) {
00354     // --- equations enforcing zero principal point
00355     // --- i+1  -> x-principal point = 0
00356     // --- i+2  -> y-principal point = 0
00357     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00358     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(2), coeffs.row(i+1));
00359     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(0), coeffs.row(i+2));
00360     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(1), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i+3)); // tmp
00361     coeffs.row(i+2) -= coeffs.row(i+3);
00362     i += 3;
00363 
00364   }
00365   for(j = 0; j<V; ++j) {
00366     // --- equation enforcing aspect skew + pxpy = 0 
00367     quadratic_prod(view(j).row(0), view(j).row(1), coeffs.row(i));
00368     ++i;
00369   }
00370   // --- equation to set scale
00371   quadratic_prod(view(0).row(2), view(0).row(2), coeffs.row(i));
00372   y(i) = 1.0;
00373 
00374   // --- solve least squares and reform Q
00375 
00376   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00377 
00378   std::cout << "coeffs*x = " << std::endl;
00379   std::cout << coeffs*x << std::endl;
00380 
00381   k = 0;
00382   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00383     for(j = i; j<4; ++j){ 
00384       Q(i,j) = Q(j,i) = x(k++);
00385     }
00386     Q(i,i) *= 2.0;
00387   }
00388 
00389   // --- extract A from Q
00390   // --------------------
00391   Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::Matrix4d> svdQ(Q, Eigen::ComputeFullU);
00392   A = svdQ.matrixU().leftCols(3) * 
00393     svdQ.singularValues().topRows(3).cwiseSqrt().asDiagonal();
00394   p.transpose() = -A.row(3) * A.topRows(3).inverse();
00395   
00396   return(p);
00397 }

00399 
00404 template<int V>
00405 Eigen::Matrix4d MotionMatrix<V>::euclidean_lift(const Eigen::Vector3d &p) {
00406   int                                   i,j,k;
00407   Eigen::Matrix<double, 2*V + 1, 6>     coeffs;
00408   Eigen::Matrix<double, 2*V + 1, 1>     y;
00409   Eigen::Matrix<double, 6, 1>           x;
00410   Eigen::Matrix3d                       HT;  // inverse transpose of the 
00411                                              // infinite homography
00412   Eigen::Matrix3d                       iac; // image of the absolute conic
00413   Eigen::Matrix3d                       K;   // camera intrinsics
00414   Eigen::Matrix4d                       H;   // transform 
00415 
00416   y.fill(0.0);
00417   i = 0;
00418   for(j = 0; j<V; ++j) {
00419     // --- If P = [A|a], H^-T = (A - ap^T)^-T
00420     // --------------------------------------
00421     HT.transpose() = (view(j).leftCols(3) - 
00422                       view(j).col(3)*p.transpose()).inverse();
00423     if(j == 0) {
00424       // --- equation to set scale
00425       quadratic_prod(HT.row(0), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i)); // zero skew
00426       quadratic_prod(HT.row(1), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i+1)); // aspect ratio=1
00427       quadratic_prod(HT.row(2), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i+2)); // aspect ratio=1
00428       coeffs.row(i) += coeffs.row(i+1);
00429       coeffs.row(i) += coeffs.row(i+2);
00430       y(i) = 1.0;
00431       ++i;
00432     }
00433     quadratic_prod(HT.row(0), HT.row(0), coeffs.row(i)); // aspect ratio=1
00434     quadratic_prod(HT.row(1), HT.row(1), coeffs.row(i+1));
00435     coeffs.row(i) -= coeffs.row(i+1);
00436     quadratic_prod(HT.row(0), HT.row(2), coeffs.row(i+1)); // zero skew
00437     i += 2;
00438   }
00439 
00440   x = coeffs.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU | Eigen::ComputeFullV).solve(y);
00441 
00442   std::cout << "coeffs*x = " << std::endl;
00443   std::cout << coeffs*x << std::endl;
00444 
00445   k = 0;
00446   for(i = 0; i<3; ++i) {
00447     for(j = i; j<3; ++j){ 
00448       iac(i,j) = iac(j,i) = x(k++);
00449     }
00450     iac(i,i) *= 2.0;
00451   }
00452 
00453   K = iac.llt().matrixU();
00454   H.topLeftCorner(3,3) = K.inverse();
00455   H.leftCols(3).row(3) = -p.transpose()*H.topLeftCorner(3,3);
00456 
00457   // --- set origin at view 0
00458   H.col(3).topRows(3) = -view(0).leftCols(3).inverse()*view(0).col(3);
00459   H(3,3) = 1.0;
00460 
00461   return(H);
00462 }
00463 
00476 template<int VIEWS>
00477 double MotionMatrix<VIEWS>::KR_decompose(int i, Eigen::Affine2d &K,
00478                                                 Eigen::AngleAxisd &R) const {
00479   Eigen::Matrix3d       MMT;            // M*M^T
00480   Eigen::Matrix3d       RMat;           // Rotation in matrix form
00481   double                scale;          // scaling factor
00482   Eigen::Affine2d       K1;             // inverse intrinsics
00483 
00484   // --- Do Cholesky decomposition of
00485   // --- (MM^T)^-1 = K^-TR^-TR^-1K^-1
00486   // ---           = K^-TK^-1 = LL^T
00487   // --- then    R = K^-1M
00488   // --------------------------------
00489   MMT   = M(i) * M(i).transpose();
00490   K1.matrix()  = MMT.inverse().llt().matrixU();
00491   RMat  = K1.matrix() * M(i);
00492   scale = 1.0/K1(2,2);
00493   K1.matrix() *= scale;
00494   K     = K1.inverse();
00495 
00496   /************
00497   // --- Do QR decomposition where
00498   // --- if X.fliprows^T = QR then
00499   // --- X = R^T.fliprows.flipcols Q^T.fliprows
00500   // ------------------------------------------
00501   K.matrix().triangularView<Eigen::Upper>() = 
00502     M(i).colwise().reverse().transpose().
00503     householderQr().matrixQR().
00504     transpose().colwise().reverse().rowwise().reverse();
00505   K(1,0) = 0.0;
00506   // --- ensure +ve focal lengths
00507   int j;
00508   for(j = 0; j<3; ++j) {
00509     if(K(j,j) < 0.0) {
00510       K.matrix().col(j) *= -1.0;
00511     }
00512   }
00513   scale = K(2,2);
00514   K.matrix() /= scale;
00515   RMat = (K.inverse() * M(i))/scale;
00516   **********/
00517 
00518   // --- remove reflections and
00519   // --- extract rotation angles
00520   if(RMat.determinant() < 0.0) {
00521     RMat *= -1.0;
00522     scale *= -1.0;
00523   }
00524   R = RMat;
00525 
00526   return(scale);
00527 }
00528 
00529 
00543 template<int VIEWS>
00544 double MotionMatrix<VIEWS>::KR_decompose(ImageTransform<VIEWS> &K,
00545                                          ImageTransform<VIEWS> &R) const {
00546   int                   i;
00547   Eigen::Affine2d       Kn;
00548   Eigen::AngleAxisd     Rn;
00549 
00550   for(i = 0; i<VIEWS; ++i) {
00551     KR_decompose(i,Kn,Rn);
00552     K.view(i) = Kn.matrix();
00553     R.view(i) = Rn.toRotationMatrix();
00554   }
00555   return(0.0);
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00562 template<int V>
00563 void MotionMatrix<V>::reprojection_err(
00564                                        const MeasurementMatrix<V> &E,
00565                                        Eigen::VectorXd &err) {
00566   int                           i,j,n;
00567   Eigen::Matrix<double, 3*V, 1> reproj;
00568   ShapeMatrix                   shape;
00569   bool                          resizeErr;
00570 
00571   if(err.size() == 0) {
00572     err.resize(2*V*E.cols());
00573     resizeErr = true;
00574   } else {
00575     resizeErr = false;
00576   }
00577 
00578   shape.solve(E, *this);
00579   n = 0;
00580   for(j=0; j<E.cols(); ++j) {
00581     reproj = *this * shape.col(j);
00582     for(i = 0; i<V; ++i) {
00583       if(!E.pixel_is_occluded(i,j)) {
00584         err(n++) = reproj(3*i)  /reproj(3*i+2)-E.pixel(i,j)(0)/E.pixel(i,j)(2);
00585         err(n++) = reproj(3*i+1)/reproj(3*i+2)-E.pixel(i,j)(1)/E.pixel(i,j)(2);
00586       }
00587     }
00588   }
00589 
00590   if(resizeErr) {
00591     err.conservativeResize(n);
00592   } else {
00593     while(n < err.size()) {
00594       err(n++) = 0.0;
00595     }
00596   }
00597 }

00602 template<int V>
00603 template<class D>
00604 MotionMatrix<V> &MotionMatrix<V>::operator=(const Eigen::MatrixBase<D> &o) {
00605   Base::operator=(o);
00606   return(*this);
00607 }

00613 template<int V>
00614 void MotionMatrix<V>::quadratic_prod(const Eigen::Vector4d &v,
00615                                      const Eigen::Vector4d &w,
00616                                      typename Eigen::Matrix<double,Eigen::Dynamic,10>::RowXpr result) {
00617   int i,j,k;
00618 
00619   k = 0;
00620   for(i = 0; i<4; ++i) {
00621     for(j = i; j<4; ++j) {
00622       result(k++) = v(i)*w(j) + v(j)*w(i);
00623     }
00624   }
00625 }
00626 
00629 template<int VIEWS>
00630 void MotionMatrix<VIEWS>::quadratic_prod(const Eigen::Vector3d &v,
00631                                          const Eigen::Vector3d &w,
00632                  typename Eigen::Matrix<double,2*VIEWS+1,6>::RowXpr result) {
00633   int i,j,k;
00634 
00635   k = 0;
00636   for(i = 0; i<3; ++i) {
00637     for(j = i; j<3; ++j) {
00638       result(k++) = v(i)*w(j) + v(j)*w(i);
00639     }
00640   }
00641 }
